title: Friends classic quiz scene recreated in Lego by Jennifer Garner
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

The classic quiz scene from Friends has been lovingly recreated in Lego form by actress Jennifer Garner.

Jennifer used the clip as a way of welcoming another Jennifer – Friends star Jennifer Aniston – to Instagram.

The scene appeared in the season four episode The One With The Embryos, and saw Rachel (Aniston), Monica (Courteney Cox) go head to head with Chandler (Matthew Perry) and Joey (Matt LeBlanc) for the grand prize of Monica’s apartment.

Jennifer, 47, used Lego figures to reenact the lightning round section of the quiz where the two teams were asked quickfire questions about each other.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Ultimately the girls lost the quiz to the boys, thanks to Rachel failing to correctly name what Chandler does for a living.

The star even provided the voices for the characters herself, and didn’t even let a small slip up like the Lego figures’ hair falling off stop her.

Her clip comes after Jennifer, the Friends one, joined Instagram in a big way by posting a selfie with the entire main cast of the sitcom reunited.

The 50-year-old racked up 6.9million followers in less than a day, with the Friends reunion selfie fetching over 8.6million likes so far.

Jennifer Garner welcomed Jennifer Aniston to Instagram (Picture: Getty)

Other celebs who have welcomed Jennifer to the world of Instagram include Dolly Parton, Reese Witherspoon, and Ross actor David, who posted a pic of Rachel and Ross in Lego form to greet his former castmate, with Jen writing: ‘Hi Schwimmy!’

Jennifer Aniston made the best arrival on Instagram (Picture: Instagram)

90210 star Sarah Foster shared a picture of her, Jen and their friends and joked: ‘I feel bad Jennifer Aniston is struggling to get followers so I wanted to help her out. Throw her a bone guys, she’s a lovely person’ – with Jen captioning the pic: ‘You’re a good friend.’

description: Friends classic quiz scene recreated in Lego by Jennifer Garner to welcome Jennifer Aniston to Instagram
